price: Yang demikian itu adalah karena sesungguhnya Allah (kuasa) memasukkan malam ke dalam siang dan memasukkan siang ke dalam malam dan bahwasanya Allah Maha Mendengar lagi Maha Melihat.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُولِجُ ٱلَّيۡلَ فِي ٱلنَّهَارِ وَيُولِجُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فِي ٱلَّيۡلِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعُۢ بَصِيرٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-anna al-laha yūliju al-layla fī al-nahāri wayūliju al-nahāra fī al-layli wa-anna al-laha samīʿun baṣīrun
